official_title: A bill to amend Section 2 of the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935.
short_title: Natural Gas Company Regulatory Reform Act of 1982

summary.text: Natural Gas Company Regulatory Reform Act of 1982 - Amends the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 to exclude from the definition of "gas utility company" and therefore from regulation under such Act those companies: (1) the intrastate gas utility rates of which are subject to State regulation; (2) which do not own or operate facilities used for retail distribution of natural or manufactured gas for heat, light, or power; and (3) which are controlled by issuers of registered securities.

titles.title: Natural Gas Company Regulatory Reform Act of 1982
A bill to amend Section 2 of the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935.
